parameter.name: fields
parameter.description: An array of api fields to be returned in the response, if not specified name,company and type will be returned.Only staff can view email,fax,groups,location,logindetails,phone,tags,teams and title.

parameter.name: allowLogin
parameter.description: The Login status, true - Contacts with Login Access, false - Contacts without Login Access.

parameter.name: apiFields
parameter.description: The apiFields filters the response based on the API fields values. Provide an API Field ID and String separated by a comma. Multiple API Field IDs and String pairs can be provided by separating them two pipe characters. E.g. 2,Europe||3,Industrial||3,Commercial.

parameter.name: apiFieldsMode
parameter.description: The apiFieldsMode specifies the Mode used for the apiFields parameter. Possible values are 'any' and 'all'. Defaults to 'any'.

parameter.name: companyId
parameter.description: The companyId the contacts should be belong to.

parameter.name: divisionId
parameter.description: The division identifier specifies the Contacts under the specific division to be returned.

parameter.name: contactIds
parameter.description: The List of Contact IDs the contacts should be retrieved from.

parameter.name: idFrom
parameter.description: Contacts with ID greater than or equal to this value will be returned.

parameter.name: idTo
parameter.description: Contacts with ID less than or equal to this value will be returned.

parameter.name: lastModifiedFrom
parameter.description: Contacts added/edited on or after this date will be returned. Can provide either specific date and time(yyyy-mm-ddThh:mm) or relative time(Xn/h/d/w/m - X minutes/hours/days/weeks/months ago).

parameter.name: lastModifiedTo
parameter.description: Contacts added/edited on or before this date will be returned. Can provide either specific date and time(yyyy-mm-ddThh:mm) or relative time(Xn/h/d/w/m - X minutes/hours/days/weeks/months ago).

parameter.name: isPending
parameter.description: Pending status.true - Pending Contacts, false - Active Contacts(default).

parameter.name: roleIds
parameter.description: Contacts with at least one of the specified Role ID/s will be returned.

parameter.name: search
parameter.description: The Search string, Contacts where Name or Email contains string(e.g. testString) or does not contain(e.g. !testString) will be returned. A minimum of 3 characters are required.

parameter.name: searchEmail
parameter.description: The searchEmail string, Contacts where Email Address contains string(e.g. testString) or does not contain(e.g. !testString) will be returned. A minimum of 3 characters are required.

parameter.name: searchName
parameter.description: The searchName string, Contacts where name contains string(e.g. testString) or does not contain(e.g. !testString) will be returned. A minimum of 3 characters are required.

parameter.name: tagIds
parameter.description: An array of tag Identifiers, Contacts with at least one of the specified Tag ID/s will be returned.

parameter.name: type
parameter.description: The Contact Type. Possible values:client - Client Contacts, contractor - Contractor, Contactsother - Other, Contactsstaff - Staff Contacts.

parameter.name: pageNumber
parameter.description: The pageNumber(must be used with pagesize) to return a subset of Contacts.

parameter.name: pageSize
parameter.description: The Page Size(must be used with pagenumber).

parameter.name: sortBy
parameter.description: The sortBy specifies the Sort field. Possible values are id - Contact ID, firstname - Contact First Name(default), lastname - Contact Last Name.

parameter.name: sortOrder
parameter.description: The sortOrder specifies the sorting order. POssible values are asc(default) and desc.
